name: Hardcore Dirt Bike
description: Ride your dirt bike with this amazing motocross racing simulator. Make tricks to earn extra-credits to unlock bikes and tracks! Feel the realism of the full 3d OUTDOOR environments with 5 long tracks and 12 bike models coming with different power,grip and brake settings. Enter the game right from the beginning with the stunning 3d menu replicating the real scene of a race backstage!
